title: What is Trump's approval rating? Gallup poll finds Republicans souring
shortDescription: President Donald Trump continues to see historically low approval ratings. Gallup found Americans reacted strongly to Charlie Kirk's murder.

title: Democrat wins Arizona special election, shrinking House GOP margin
shortDescription: Democrat Adelita Grijalva won the Sept. 23 Arizona special election to fill the U.S. House seat left vacant by her father, Raúl Grijalva.

title: Trump rips climate science, tells UN that global warming is a 'green scam'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump continued to cast doubts on climate change and global warming in UN speech, touting his push to expand fossil fuels.

title: Jury finds Trump's would-be assassin guilty
shortDescription: 59-year-old Ryan Routh faces life in prison after a jury found him guilty of attempting to assassinate President Donald Trump.

title: Trump: NATO should shoot down Russian jets
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said NATO countries should shoot down Russian aircraft if they enter their airspace.

title: Trump and Epstein hold hands in sculpture placed on National Mall
shortDescription: A 12-foot statue of President Donald Trump and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein holding hands appeared on the National Mall on Sept. 23, 2025.

title: Trump bullish on Ukraine's prospects after earlier skepticism
shortDescription: Trump jabbed at Russia as a 'paper tiger' and said Ukraine 'is in a position to fight and WIN all of Ukraine back in its original form.'

title: Protest art on National Mall shows Trump, Epstein holding hands
shortDescription: It is the third anti-Trump art installation from a group called The Secret Handshake Project to pop up on the National Mall in as many months.

title: 'Justice was served': Trump applauds would-be assassin's conviction
shortDescription: Donald Trump expressed gratitude over the conviction of Ryan Routh for trying to kill him at a Florida golf course last year.

title: Trump at UN: A bad escalator, a bad teleprompter and good 'chemistry'
shortDescription: After his speech, Trump struck a conciliatory tone, telling UN Secretary General António Guterres the U.S. is "behind the UN 100%."

title: President Trump faces MAGA backlash over free speech concerns
shortDescription: President Trump is facing a rare backlash from a growing number of MAGA allies over the FCC's threats to pull Jimmy Kimmel's show off the airwaves.

title: Trump and Epstein statue appears in DC
shortDescription: A 12-foot statue of President Donald Trump and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein holding hands appeared on the National Mall.

title: Routh guilty of trying to kill Trump, tries to stab himself with pen
shortDescription: After the verdict was read, Routh appeared to try to stab himself in the neck with a pen. Authorities restrained and escorted him from the courtroom.

title: Who owns Tylenol? Parent company issues statement after Trump warning
shortDescription: President Donald Trump warned pregnant women not to take Tylenol citing, without evidence, that it causes autism. Who owns the painkiller company?

title: Trump reacts to teleprompter issues at UN
shortDescription: During his speech at the United Nations General Assembly, President Trump had issues with his teleprompter.

title: Trump addresses UN General Assembly
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke to world leaders at the United Nations General Assembly, often criticizing other nations.

title: Trump promotes DC crime fighting at UN by inviting diplomats to dinner
shortDescription: Trump interrupted his United Nations speech to invite diplomats to dinner in DC, to illustrate the capital's reduction in crime.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to end protections for Venezuelans in US
shortDescription: The Trump administration has urged the U.S. Supreme Court to withdraw deportation protections that had been extended to around 300,000 Venezuelans.

title: Supreme Court allows Trump to fire FTC commissioner
shortDescription: In a divided order, the Supreme Court cleared the way for Trump to remove Rebecca Kelly Slaughter, a member of the Federal Trade Commission.

title: Kamala Harris calls Trump a 'tyrant'
shortDescription: Former Vice President Kamala Harris slammed President Donald Trump as a "tyrant" on MSNBC's "The Rachel Maddow Show."

title: Trump’s remarks conflict with Hegseth’s order on Pentagon press pool
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump appeared to downplay Pentagon restrictions aimed at limiting journalists' coverage of US military activities.​

title: Trump says he should have been picked to renovate UN headquarters
shortDescription: Trump still seemed sore about not being tapped to do the renovation project in the early 2000s.

title: Trump urges closed borders, fossil fuels in UN speech
shortDescription: Trump urged world leaders to abandon open borders and stick with fossil fuels to build a more prosperous future.

title: Trump traffic jam forces Macron to walk
shortDescription: French President Emmanuel Macron had to call President Donald Trump after his motorcade blocked Macron on his way to the French Embassy in New York.

title: Trump’s autism claims spark backlash
shortDescription: Medical experts are challenging President Donald Trump’s autism claims, defending Tylenol’s safety in pregnancy.

title: Will the government shut down? Trump cancels meeting with Democrats
shortDescription: Shortly after agreeing to a meeting with Democrats to negotiate over government funding, Trump backed out.

title: Harris knocks Trump as a 'tyrant,' says he as a 'fragile ego'
shortDescription: Kamala Harris called Donald Trump a “tyrant” in her first news interview since she lost the 2024 presidential election.
